name: System Snapshot Webserver
tagline: {Collect the computer and system info at a given time in order to track issues or problems.}
body: # System Snapshot Webserver. Collect the computer and system info at a given time in order to track issues or problems. You can share the generated report to help you detect your computer problem at a given moment. Works on **Windows** / **Linux** OS. ### Screen shots ### What kind of **Reports** 1. System Info 2. Hardware 3. Networks 4. PnP Devices 5. Processes 6. Services 7. Benchmark 8. Installed programs 9. Special files ### How to use Run program (.exe) as Administrator. Wait util report gets generated. Open or send the report to someone who can read it and analyse or problem. Note: Program can be executed with '-s', '/s' or '--silent' argument to skip GUI. Report will be generated and the html file will show on explorer after completion. Example: "SystemInfoSnapshot.exe -s"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
